scripts.build: PUBLIC_GIT_COMMIT_SHA=$(git rev-parse HEAD) PUBLIC_BUILD_TIME=$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ) astro check && PUBLIC_GIT_COMMIT_SHA=$(git rev-parse HEAD) PUBLIC_BUILD_TIME=$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ) astro build
scripts.deploy:preview: pnpm run build && wrangler deploy --env preview
